title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item on first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

OB: It is not possible to select any item in the library outline view on the first attempt.

EB: The expected behavior is that it should be possible to select any item in the library outline view on the first attempt.

SR: 
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
